hero.title: Sr. DevOps Engineer | Cloud & IaC Specialist

hero.description: Experienced DevOps Engineer with nearly 3 years of expertise in optimizing CI/CD pipelines, ensuring application security, and delivering scalable solutions on AWS, GCP, and Azure. about.heading: About Me
about.content: I am a passionate DevOps Engineer with a strong background in cloud-native solutions, infrastructure as code, and automation. I thrive on solving complex problems, leading migrations, and building secure, scalable environments across AWS, GCP, and Azure.

skills: CI/CD: Bitbucket CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab, Azure DevOps
Cloud: AWS (ECS, RDS, EC2, ElastiCache, GuardDuty, CloudTrail, CloudWatch, WAF, Fargate)
Cloud: GCP (Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, Pub/Sub, Cloud SQL)
IaC: Terraform (Modular, Public & Custom Modules), Bicep
Security: Zero Trust Architecture, Cloudflare, PCI DSS Compliance

projects.name: DevOps Firefighting & Architecture Shifts (Tooly)
projects.description: Sole DevOps engineer responsible for critical infrastructure maintenance and major architecture transitions. Led direct client communication, explaining technical constraints and architectural decisions when client requirements didn't align with system capabilities.

projects.name: DevOps Infrastructure & CI/CD (FitForever)
projects.description: Sole DevOps engineer managing cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment automation for the fitness platform. Ensured high availability and performance for personalized fitness programs.

projects.name: DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure (GolfForever)
projects.description: Sole DevOps engineer handling cloud infrastructure, monitoring, and deployment automation for the golf training platform. Managed scalable infrastructure supporting video-based training systems.

projects.name: Microservices Migration (Duett)
projects.description: Led a 14-member team in migrating from monolithic to microservices architecture, designing and implementing a multi-account AWS strategy for secure, isolated environments.

projects.name: Zero Trust Architecture (Xquic)
projects.description: Implemented Zero Trust Architecture using AWS ECS and RDS, built secure cloud infrastructure with Terraform, and optimized CI/CD pipelines for performance and reliability.

projects.name: Azure Tenant Migration (Freelance)
projects.description: Led a POC migration of infrastructure between Azure tenants, developed build pipelines, automated releases, and ensured secure, compliant IaC deployments with Bicep.
